review: Just about the greatest invention ever!
author: Karen

review: It took me awhile to connect this to my tv and iPad. But it works. Just need very fast and good wifi connection
author: Olya

review: It works great: from my android tablet or my house mate's tablet and smart phone we can ask to chromecast to show videos from youtube, netflix etc....and any website that has a specific app for chromecast.Every people in the house can connect to the device: it is not biased to one specific account.To stream the screen of my device sometimes there is a delay. However by doing this I have been even able to watch with only few interraption a movie available online on a foreign TV website that has not specific app for chromecast.It is worth 30-35$.
author: Pl

review: This is a decent product when it functions properly, but I didn't realize before I bought it how annoying it would be to use. It really should come with a remote control. The app you're using on your phone will often time out, per say, and you'll have to re-connect and such to get control over what's playing on your TV. Would not buy again if I had the choice.
author: Bmz
